description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url][url=https://legacy.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools/localization][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Help_Translate-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=translate&color=ffbda3[/img][/url][url=https://github.com/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools/releases/latest][img]https://badgen.net/github/release/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools?style=flat-square[/img][/url]


I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know!



This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools]My Addon[/URL] so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons]https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons]https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons]https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons]https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons]https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons]https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons[/url]
[/list]



Currently has: 
[list]
[*]Halls of Valor
[*] Court of Stars
[*] Neltharions Lair
[*] Return to Karazhan (Upper and Lower)
[*] Dark Hearth Thicked
[*] Black Rook Hold
[/list]

Check out  [url=https://github.com/AcidWeb/Clean-Icons-Mechagnome-Edition]Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition[/url] if you want HD icon textures.
If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free.
If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1.
If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/sharedmedia_causese]SharedMedia Causese[/url]
If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound


Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].
[s] Versioncheck [/s] Debuff/Interrupt idea  stolen from causese props to him

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
I'm mainly a dps player so I might not realise if sth for Tank/Heal isn't working as it's supposed to if you find anything missing/buggy let me know! This is still a big Work in Progress and Auras are being generated by My Addon so head over there to be best prepared for The War Within. alternativly you can import them seperatly at the following urls:
  • https://wago.io/Current-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/TWW-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Cataclysm-Dungeons
Currently has:
  • Halls of Valor
  • Court of Stars
  • Neltharions Lair
  • Return to Karazhan (Upper and Lower)
  • Dark Hearth Thicked
  • Black Rook Hold
Check out Clean Icons Mechagnome Edition if you want HD icon textures. If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free. If you want to have timers and are not using OmiCC/Elvui select the group , go to display options and tick "show text" below text1. If you want to have some sounds, use this addon: SharedMedia Causese If you are using Causeses addon and do NOT want sounds select the group and go to Actions -> on Show and untick play sound Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. Versioncheck Debuff/Interrupt idea stolen from causese props to him If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Fleymour[/taggeduser] also pretty sure that is permanently active on the boss right?

[taggeduser]@Fleymour[/taggeduser] thanks for all the suggestions for easier tracking in the future can you make them over at https://github.com/Jodsderechte/DungeonAuraTools/issues/new/choose i feel like i'll loose track of some of those :D

wish: 
due to alot of tanks are moving the boss way to much / a lot of people dont know this ability
-> if boss (or add) is buffed by magma breaker the group will get tons of dmg:

https://www.wowhead.com/spell=216368/magma-breaker
https://www.wowhead.com/spell=209920/magma-breaker
https://www.wowhead.com/spell=209921/magma-breaker
[taggeduser]@Fleymour[/taggeduser] true avoid does fit better for it

sound i would change:
-> NLtrash 183088 ... first is a frontal. but thats not the important part.. after it the rocks fell down and this is a group killer.. so people should insta move from their current location.. so maybe "avoid" would fit better for both.

[taggeduser]@Xely#2668[/taggeduser] i do recognize errors whenever i run dungeons buyt by the time i get to the end i alreadt forgot again xD scream of pain is fixed locally and will be pushed sometime soon but if you end up making a list just send them my way and i'll fix them asap

There are some errors afaik in court of stars. From the top of my head : missing "stop casting" on Imacu'Tya's Scream of pain, and Gerenth's shadow bolt volley shouldn't trigger "Interrupt" since it cant be interrupted
Hey Wa not loading on halls of valor dungeon,

changelog.text: fixed missing trigger data introduced in last version
added BlackRookHold and DarkHearthThicked
update to newest addon version
additional fixes for season 2
fixes and additions
added Neltharions Lair
fixed load condition for halls of Valor
bugfixes
fixes of bugs discovered during addon creation
fixed maiden potential nil error
- added shrouded
- updated [KARAZHAN - LOWER] 04 Intangible Presence
- updated [KARAZHAN - LOWER] 04 Intangible Presence

- changed [KARAZHAN - LOWER] 04 Intangible Presence to autosolver 

get the original at https://wago.io/FZZ60sOo3 (THX IRONI!)
- added match count to [KARAZHAN - UPPER] 02 Flame Wreath - thx Arrg

- added Upper Kara Trash
- fixed some bugs

- added shield amount to [KARAZHAN - LOWER] 02 Holy Bulwark - Thanks @Gaver!
- moved [BRH] 04 Dreadlord's Guile ongoing to Bars subgroup - Thanks @Murava!
- fixed some bugs for [Karazhan]

- added some Lower Kara Trash
- changed to Main/Double Subgroup layout for Icons/Bars
- added rest of [KARAZHAN UPPER] bosses
- added rest of [KARAZHAN UPPER] bosses
- added [KARAZHAN UPPER] bosses 1+2
- finished adding lower karazhan bosses
- started ading [Karazhan] in preparation for Season 4
- fixed [BRH] Sic Bats

- fixed load conditions for infernal affix auras 
- enabled Timer for [NL] Skitter inc
- fixed nil errors in [EOA] 04 Quake soon
- fixed custom activation for [EOATRASH] Violent Winds
- added [VOTW] 05 Deepening Shadow
- fixed [VOTWTRASH] Deafening Shout
- added visuals to [VOTWTRASH] Thunderclap debuff

added some experimental features for infernal affix please let me know if you encounter any bugs
- added [INFERNAL] Wavespawn to show when next wave will spawn
- added impact notification to [INFERNAL] Fel Bombardment
- fixed [INFERNAL] Infernal Heat
- changed [INFERNAL] Web of Concealment to display the tank when stuff is buffed by the web

- fixed [VOTW] 02 Seed of Corruption inc unit
- added approximate next add spawn via [NL] 01 Blightshard Skitter next

- added sorting for group auras
- fixed conditions of [BRH] 03 Hateful Gaze
- fixed conditions of [BRHTRASH] Sic Bats! 
- fixed unit in [BRHTRASH] Bonebreaking Strike
- fixed nil error in [BRH] 01 Restless Soul
- added stunable visuals to [VOTWTRASH] Fel Gaze
- added stunable visuals to [NLTRASH] Avalanche

- fixed nil error in [COS] BeaconList
- added ccable visuals to [COSTRASH] Eye Storm 
- removed useless destUnit displays from [COS] 03 Blade Surge
- fixed [COSTRASH] Disintegration Beam to show wrong target

- hopefully finally fixed [BRH] 01 Restless Soul
- condensed [BRHTRASH] Sacrifice Soul and [BRHTRASH] Sacrifice Soul cast into 1 aura
- condensed [BRHTRASH] Sic Bats! and [BRHTRASH] Sic Bats! on you into 1 aura
- added ccable visuals to [NLTRASH] Metamorphosis
- added Calculation to [EOA] 04 Quake soon, [NL] 02 Stance of the Mountain and [NL] 04 Magma Wave inc

- fixed  [VOTW] 02 Sap Soul to not show wrong direction to look
- added hp text to [VOTW] 03 Overloaded Lens
- fixed nil error in [BRH] 01 Restless Soul
- fixed [BRHTRASH] Sacrifice Soul active to not be always loaded

-fixed [EOATRASH] Arcane Rebound to show the correct destUnit
-fixed [EOATRASH] Violent Winds to trigger of the aura instead of non existing cast

- changed text and sound of [NLTRASH] Scorch to "dance" to properly reflect the mechanic
- removed sound of [NLTRASH] Stone Bolt due to unneccesary spam

- added back loading condition i removed for testing to [NL] 04 Molten Crash to only load for tank/heal
- added proper formating to [NL] 01 Blightshard Skitter
- drycoded and added infernal affix auras

- added missing loading conditions for boss encounter
- fixed alot of conditions
- fixed some debuffIcons not showing up properly

This should be finished and initial version for Legion Timewalking hitting liveservers and only minor adjustments should be needed.
